title: STAT+: The old Vinay Prasad never left. He just changed jobs
description: Prasad changed jobs but his conservative regulatory doctrine remains the same, particularly for cell and gene therapies. The approval bar is much higher now.
content: Prasad changed jobs but his conservative regulatory doctrine remains the same, particularly for cell and gene therapies. The approval bar is much higher now.
